body: Currently develop share/spack/setups.{csh,sh} puts just the micro-architecture specific (i.e. ivybridge) paths in `MODULEPATH,` anything built with the generic (i.e. x86_64) architecture thus cannot be accessed via module load, etc.   This patch adds them both to modulepath.  It finds the generic architecture by scanning the output of `spack arch --known-targets`
title: add generic module directories as well as microarchitecture specific
